doc.name: FSMMatcher
doc.description: A matcher to match any FSM actor.
doc.author: Thomas Huining Feng
doc.property: The attribute containing all the criteria in a list (ptolemy.actor.gt.GTIngredientList).
The attribute containing all the operations in a list (ptolemy.actor.gt.GTIngredientList).
The attribute that specifies the name of the corresponding entity in the pattern.
